Title: Expose Offline LLM via RESTful API
Description:
Want to make your own offline Large Language Model (LLM) available through an API endpoint?
In this video, I‚Äôll walk you step-by-step through creating an ASP.NET Core Web API that serves responses from your locally hosted LLM‚Äîno cloud required.

You‚Äôll learn:

How to integrate an offline LLM (GGUF format) into your ASP.NET Core project
How to design an API endpoint to interact with your model
How to build a client that sends prompts and streams responses

This approach gives you:
‚úÖ Full data privacy ‚Äì nothing leaves your server
‚úÖ Cost control ‚Äì no monthly API bills
‚úÖ Freedom & flexibility ‚Äì choose and switch models anytime

Whether you‚Äôre building a personal AI assistant, integrating into internal tools, or creating a secure enterprise AI service, this tutorial will help you take control of your AI infrastructure.

üìÇ Source code here:
https://github.com/hassanhabib/LLM.Offline.API.Streaming

#OfflineLLM #ASPNETCore #LocalAI #SelfHostedAI #DotNet #GGUF #LlamaCpp

Title: Offline LLM + MCP: Smart Tool Calling in Action
Description:
Learn how to combine an offline LLM with the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to build an AI that can discover tools dynamically and call the right one.

In this demo, I use Mistral 7B Instruct (GGUF) running locally to:
Read the MCP function catalog in real time
Choose the correct tool based on a user request
Execute it‚Äîall offline

Perfect for:
Privacy-first AI development
Local & offline LLM setups
Smart function calling without cloud dependencies

Here's the source code:
https://github.com/hassanhabib/SimpleMcp.Demo

Tech stack: C# (.NET 9), Mistral 7B Instruct Q8_0, MCP, offline LLM.

Title: Blueberry Hill
Description:
ChatGPT 5 was released today.




    ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has unveiled the long-awaited latest version of its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot, GPT-5, saying it can provide PhD-level expertise. Billed as ‚Äúsmarter, faster, and more useful,‚Äù OpenAI co-founder and chief executive Sam Altman lauded the company‚Äôs new model as ushering in a new era of ChatGPT. ‚ÄúI think having something like GPT-5 would be pretty much unimaginable at any previous time in human history,‚Äù he said ahead of Thursday‚Äôs launch. GPT-5‚Äôs release and claims of its ‚ÄúPhD-level‚Äù abilities in areas such as coding and writing come as tech firms continue to compete to have the most advanced AI chatbot.
